content.event: Reading Slack Messages with Serverless Functions
content.description: For many reasons, your development team may want to investigate messages from Slack, alter them in a proper way, or take some actions according to some specific input.

content.event: Serverless at the End of the Universe
content.description: Serverless functions are extremely good at what they do and provide planet-scale computing power. The one thing where serverless functions fall short is when it comes to state management.

content.event: Good Morning Serverless - Rob Sutter
content.description: Tom McLaughlin interviews AWS Developer Advocate Rob Sutter

content.event: A Universal Hostless Substrate: Full Stack Web Apps Without a Backend, and More!
content.description: Come learn about what is being built today for the next wave of computing, how we evolve past the serverless paradigm, and how it can make life simpler for developers and end users!

content.event: Using Containers in Serverless Architectures
content.description: Our June 2nd meeting will be all about Containers for Serverless.

content.event: Workshop: Serverless Web Applications and Introduction to Amplify
content.description: In this workshop you’ll deploy a simple web application. The application will present users with an HTML-based user interface and will interface on the back-end with a RESTful web service.

content.event: ServerlessDays Amsterdam ONLINE meetup
content.description: Join us for our ONLINE edition for the ServerlessDays Amsterdam meetup! We'll do a live stream which consists of sessions and a live Q&A session with the speakers.

content.event: Building loosely coupled serverless solutions with Azure Event Grid
content.description: Even in the new world of Serverless we continue to see traditional software design challenges such as tight coupling between components. We will look at how we can build loosely coupled applications.

content.event: Building serverless analytics pipelines
content.description: Join Marcia Villalba in this webinar, when she shows how to build a serverless analytics pipeline from scratch, without any need to know about complex data science tools.

content.event: Azure's Cloud Platform: Building Serverless Applications
content.description: Azure provides us with the perfect toolkit of serverless components to build powerful cloud solutions. We have Azure Functions, Logic Apps, API Management and Service Bus.

content.event: Serverless Office Hours on Twitch
content.description: AWS is hosting a Tech Office hours about serverless. In this edition, Sohan Maheshwar and Marek Kuczynski from AWS will answer your questions about serverless.

content.event: AWS hands-on: serverless API development with AWS Chalice (online workshop)
content.description: Online hands-on workshop about building an API in an AWS environment and using AWS Chalice framework to do that in a serverless manner.
